'''Radiant Spincrystal 84''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] Settlement for Exiles in the [[Serenitea Pot]].<!--to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].-->

It is located in [[Aaru Village]], on some crates near [[Kazim]].
